T11dhkprvku:436: 02179 hetv-antara-anumānaṃ syān na etan nityeṣu vidyate
T11dhkprvku:438: 02180 nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā ahetor anya-anapekṣaṇāt
T11dhkprvku:439: 02180 taikṣṇya-ādīnāṃ yathā na asti kāraṇaṃ kaṇḍaka-ādiṣu
T11dhkprvku:440: 02181 tathā akāraṇam etat syād iti kecit pracakṣate
T11dhkprvku:441: 02181 saty eva yasmin yaj janma vikāre vā api vikriyā
T11dhkprvku:442: 02182 tat tasya kāraṇaṃ prāhus tat teṣām api vidyate
T11dhkprvku:444: 02183 nityānāṃ pratiṣedhena na īśvara-ādeś ca sambhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:448: 02185 yato api prāṇinaḥ kāma-vibhava-icche ca te mate
T11dhkprvku:454: 02188 imān tu yuktiman vicchan bādhate sva-mataṃ svayam
T11dhkprvku:456: 02189 sabhāga-jāteḥ prāk siddhiḥ kāraṇatve api na uditam
T11dhkprvku:457: 02189 ajñānam uktā tṛṣṇā eva santāna-preraṇād bhave
T11dhkprvku:458: 02190 ānantaryān na karma api sati tasminn asambhavāt
T11dhkprvku:461: 02191 yāvad ātmani na premṇo hāniḥ sa paritasyati
T11dhkprvku:462: 02192 tāvad duḥkhitam āropya na ca svastho avatiṣṭhate
T11dhkprvku:471: 02196 mohaś ca mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sa ca sattva-graho vinā
T11dhkprvku:472: 02197 tena ādya-hetau na dveṣo na doṣo ataḥ kṛpā matā
T11dhkprvku:474: 02198 akṣīṇa-śaktiḥ saṃskāro yeṣāṃ tiṣṭhanti te anaghāḥ
T11dhkprvku:475: 02198 mandatvāt karuṇāyāś ca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān
T11dhkprvku:476: 02199 tiṣṭhanty eva para-adhīnāḥ yeṣāṃ tu mahatī kṛpā
T11dhkprvku:477: 02199 satkāyadṛṣṭer vigamād ādya eva abhavo bhavet
T11dhkprvku:478: 02200 mārge cet sahaja-ahāner na hānau vā bhavaḥ kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:479: 02200 sukhī bhave ayaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ
T11dhkprvku:480: 02201 yā eva aham iti dhīḥ sā eva sahajaṃ sattva-darśanam
T11dhkprvku:481: 02201 na hy apaśyann aham iti snihyaty ātmani kaścana
T11dhkprvku:482: 02202 na ca ātmani vinā premṇā sukha-kāmo abhidhāvati
T11dhkprvku:483: 02202 duḥkha-utpādasya hetutvaṃ bandho nityasya tat kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:485: 02203 anityatvena yo avācyaḥ sa heturn na hi kasyacit
T11dhkprvku:486: 02204 bandha-mokṣāv avācye api na vidyete kathaṃ ca na
T11dhkprvku:487: 02204 nityaṃ tam āhur vidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati
T11dhkprvku:488: 02205 tyaktvā imāṃ hrepaṇīṃ dṛṣṭim ato nityaḥ sa ucyatām
T11dhkprvku:489: 02205 ukto mārgasya tad abhyāsād āśrayaḥ parivartate
T11dhkprvku:490: 02206 sātmye api doṣa-bhāvaś cen mārgavan na avibhutvataḥ
T11dhkprvku:491: 02206 viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ dharmo vijñānasya yathā asti saḥ
T11dhkprvku:492: 02207 gṛhyate so asya janako vidyamāna-ātmanā iti ca
T11dhkprvku:493: 02207 eṣā prakṛtir asyās tan nimitta-antarataḥ skhalat
T11dhkprvku:495: 02208 prabhāsvaram idaṃ cittaṃ prakṛtyā āgantavo malāḥ
T11dhkprvku:496: 02209 tat-prāg apy asamarthānāṃ paścāc śaktiḥ kva tanmaye
T11dhkprvku:497: 02209 na alaṃ praroḍhum atyantaṃ syandinyām agni-vad bhuvi
T11dhkprvku:500: 02211 na bādhā yatnavattve api buddhes tat pakṣa-pātataḥ
T11dhkprvku:502: 02212 rāga-pratighayor bādhā bhede api na parasparam
T11dhkprvku:504: 02213 tan-mūlāś ca malāḥ sarve sa ca satkāyadarśanam
T11dhkprvku:507: 02214 vyākhyeyo atra virodho yas tad-virodhāc ca tanmayaiḥ
T11dhkprvku:512: 02217 sa ātmatvena anapāyatvād anekāntāc ca bhasma-vat
T11dhkprvku:513: 02217 yaḥ paśyaty ātmānaṃ tatra aham iti śāśvataḥ snehaḥ
T11dhkprvku:514: 02218 snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇā doṣāṃs tiraskurute
T11dhkprvku:515: 02218 guṇa-darśī paritṛṣyan mama iti tat sādhanāny upādatte
T11dhkprvku:516: 02219 tena ātma-abhiniveśo yāvat tāvat sa saṃsāre
T11dhkprvku:519: 02220 niyamena ātmani snihyaṃs tadīye na virajyate
T11dhkprvku:520: 02221 na ca asty ātmani nirdoṣe sneha-apagama-kāraṇam
T11dhkprvku:521: 02221 snehaḥ sadoṣa iti cet tataḥ kiṃ tasya varjanam
T11dhkprvku:522: 02222 adūṣite asya viṣaye na śakyaṃ tasya varjanam
T11dhkprvku:524: 02223 tayor adṛṣṭir viṣaye na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ
T11dhkprvku:525: 02223 na hi sneha-guṇāt snehaḥ kiṃ tv artha-guṇa-darśanāt
T11dhkprvku:526: 02224 kāraṇe avikale tasmin kāryaṃ kena nivāryate
T11dhkprvku:527: 02224 kā vā sadoṣatā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkha-samāśrayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:528: 02225 tathā api na virāgo atra svatva-dṛṣṭer yathā ātmani
T11dhkprvku:529: 02225 na tair vinā duḥkha-hetur ātmā cet te api tādṛśāḥ
T11dhkprvku:530: 02226 nirdoṣaṃ dvayam apy evaṃ vairāgyaṃ na dvayos tataḥ
T11dhkprvku:532: 02227 ātmīya-buddhi-hānyā atra tyāgo na tu viparyaye
T11dhkprvku:534: 02228 svatva-dhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyaṃ tatra tat kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:536: 02229 cyuteṣu sā ghṛṇā buddhir jāyate anyatra saspṛhā
T11dhkprvku:538: 02230 sambandhaḥ sa tathā eva iti dṛṣṭāv api na hīyate
T11dhkprvku:540: 02231 duḥkha-upakārān na bhaved aṅgulyām iva cet sva-dhīḥ
T11dhkprvku:541: 02231 na hy ekāntena tad duḥkhaṃ bhūyasā saviṣa-anna-vat
T11dhkprvku:546: 02234 yasya ātmā vallabhaḥ tasya sa nāśaṃ katham icchati
T11dhkprvku:548: 02235 icchet prema kathaṃ premṇaḥ prakṛtir na hi tādṛśī
T11dhkprvku:549: 02235 sarvathā ātma-grahaḥ sneham ātmani draḍhayaty alam
T11dhkprvku:552: 02237 vṛttimān pratibadhnāti tad doṣān saṃvṛnoti ca
T11dhkprvku:553: 02237 ātmany api virāgaś cet na idānīṃ yo virajyate
T11dhkprvku:554: 02238 tyajaty asau yathā ātmānaṃ vyarthā ato duḥkha-bhāvanā
T11dhkprvku:555: 02238 duḥkha-bhāvanayā apy eṣa duḥkham eva vibhāvayet
T11dhkprvku:556: 02239 pratyakṣaṃ pūrvam api tat tathā api na virāgavān
T11dhkprvku:557: 02239 yady apy ekatra doṣeṇa tat kṣaṇaṃ calitā matiḥ
T11dhkprvku:558: 02240 viraktau na eva tatra api kāmi iva vanita-antare
T11dhkprvku:559: 02240 tyājya-upādeya-bhede hi saktir yā eva eka-bhāvinī
T11dhkprvku:562: 02242 etāvad eva ca jagat kva idānīṃ sa virajyate
T11dhkprvku:563: 02242 sadoṣatā api cet tatra tasya tatra ātmany api sā samā
T11dhkprvku:564: 02243 tatra aviraktas tad-doṣe kva idānīṃ sa virajyate
T11dhkprvku:566: 02244 sa ca indriya-ādau na tv evaṃ bāla-āder api darśanāt
T11dhkprvku:567: 02244 doṣavaty api sadbhāvāt svabhāvād guṇavaty api
T11dhkprvku:569: 02245 tata eva ca na ātmīya-buddher api guṇa-īkṣaṇam
T11dhkprvku:570: 02246 kāraṇaṃ hīyate sa api tasmān na aguṇa-darśanāt
T11dhkprvku:571: 02246 api ca asad guṇa-āropaḥ snehāt tatra hi dṛśyate
T11dhkprvku:572: 02247 tasmāt ta kāraṇā bādhī vidhis taṃ bādhate katham
T11dhkprvku:574: 02248 indriya-ādeḥ pṛthag bhūtam ātmānaṃ vetty ayaṃ janaḥ
T11dhkprvku:575: 02248 tasmān na ekatva-dṛṣṭyā api snehaḥ snihyan sa ātmani
T11dhkprvku:577: 02249 pratyutpannā tu yo duḥkhān nirvedo dveṣa īdṛśaḥ
T11dhkprvku:578: 02250 na vairāgyaṃ tadā apy asya sneho avasthā-antar eṣaṇāt
T11dhkprvku:580: 02251 tasminn nivṛtte prakṛtiṃ svām eva bhajate punaḥ
T11dhkprvku:584: 02253 sā ca naḥ pratyaya-utpattiḥ sā nairātmya-dṛg-āśrayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:586: 02254 anityāt prāha tena eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhān nirātmatām
T11dhkprvku:588: 02255 so amuktaḥ kleśa-karmabhyāṃ saṃsārī nāma tādṛśaḥ
T11dhkprvku:589: 02255 ātmīyam eva yo na icched bhoktā apy asya na vidyate
T11dhkprvku:590: 02256 ātmā api na tadā tasya kriyā-bhogau hi lakṣaṇam
T11dhkprvku:595: 02258 na alaṃ bīja-ādi-saṃsiddho vidhiḥ puṃsām ajanmane
T11dhkprvku:597: 02259 prāg guror lāghavāt paścān na pāpa-haraṇaṃ kṛtam
T11dhkprvku:598: 02260 mā bhūt gauravam eva asya na pāpaṃ gurv-amūrtitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:600: 02261 hīna-sthāna-gatir janma tena tacchin na jāyate
T11dhkprvku:601: 02261 tayor eva hi sāmarthyaṃ jātau tan-mātra-bhavataḥ
T11dhkprvku:602: 02262 te cetane svayaṃ karma ity akhaṇḍaṃ janma-kāraṇam
T11dhkprvku:604: 02263 adṛṣṭa-nāśād agatis tat saṃskāro na cetanā
T11dhkprvku:606: 02264 dṛṣṭaṃ buddhern na ca anyasya tāni santi na santi kim
T11dhkprvku:608: 02265 na syus teṣām asāmarthye tasya dīkṣā-ādy-anantaram
T11dhkprvku:609: 02265 atha buddhes tadā abhāvān na syuḥ sandhīyate malaiḥ
T11dhkprvku:610: 02266 buddhes teṣām asāmarthye jīvato api syur akṣamāḥ
T11dhkprvku:614: 02268 kriyāyām akriyāyāṃ ca kriyā ca sadṛśa-ātmanaḥ
T11dhkprvku:615: 02268 aikyaṃ ca hetu-phalayor vyatireke tatas tayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:616: 02269 kartṛ-bhoktṛtva-hāniḥ syāt sāmarthyaṃ ca na sidhyati
T11dhkprvku:618: 02270 asmṛteḥ kasyacit tena hy anubhūteḥ smṛta-udbhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:619: 02270 sthiraṃ sukhaṃ mama ahaṃ ca ity ādi satya-catuṣṭaye
T11dhkprvku:622: 02272 hanti sā anucarāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ samyag-dṛṣṭiḥ subhāvitā
T11dhkprvku:623: 02272 tri-hetorn na udbhavaḥ karma-dehayoḥ sthitayor api
T11dhkprvku:624: 02273 eka-abhāvād vinā bījaṃ na aṅkurasya iva janmanaḥ
T11dhkprvku:626: 02274 aśakyatvāc ca tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ punar udbhavāt
T11dhkprvku:627: 02274 dvaya-kṣaya-arthaṃ yatne ca vyarthaḥ karma-kṣaye śramaḥ
T11dhkprvku:629: 02275 karmaṇāṃ tāpa-saṃkleśāt na eka-rūpāt tataḥ kṣayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:630: 02276 phalaṃ kathaṃcit taj-janyam alpaṃ syān na vijātimat
T11dhkprvku:633: 02277 yadi iṣṭam aparaṃ kleśāt tat tapaḥ kleśa eva cet
T11dhkprvku:634: 02278 tat karma-phalam ity asmān na śakteḥ saṃkara-ādikam
T11dhkprvku:636: 02279 tajje karmaṇi śaktāḥ syuḥ kṛta-hāniḥ kathaṃ bhavet
T11dhkprvku:637: 02279 doṣā na karmaṇo duṣṭaḥ karoti na viparyayāt
T11dhkprvku:638: 02280 mithyā-vikalpena vinā na abhilāṣaḥ sukhād api
T11dhkprvku:643: 02282 dayayā śreya ācaṣṭe jñānāt satyaṃ sasādhanam
T11dhkprvku:644: 02283 tac ca abhiyogavān vaktuṃ yatas tasmāt pramāṇatā
T11dhkprvku:647: 02284 prayoga-darśanād vā asya yat kiṃcid udaya-ātmakam
T11dhkprvku:648: 02285 nirodha-dharmakaṃ sarvaṃ tad ity ādāv anekadhā
T11dhkprvku:650: 02285 vyāpti-pradarśanād hetoḥ sādhyena uktaṃ ca tat sphuṭam
T11dhkprvku:657: 03004 aśaktaṃ sarvam iti ced bīja-āder aṅkura-ādiṣu
T11dhkprvku:658: 03004 dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ matā sā cet saṃvṛtyā astu yathā tathā
T11dhkprvku:659: 03005 sā asti sarvatra ced buddher na anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:664: 03007 jñeyatvena grahād doṣo na abhāveṣu prasajyate
T11dhkprvku:666: 03008 jñāna-rūpatayā arthatvāt keśa-ādi iti matiḥ punaḥ
T11dhkprvku:674: 03012 sārūpyād bhrāntito vṛttir arthe cet syān na sarvadā
T11dhkprvku:675: 03013 deśa-bhrāntiś ca na jñāne tulyam utpattito dhiyaḥ
T11dhkprvku:682: 03016 ajñātasya svayaṃ jñānān nāma-ādy etena varṇitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:683: 03017 sā eva iṣṭa-arthavatī kena cakṣur-ādi-matir matā
T11dhkprvku:686: 03018 atīta-anāgataṃ vācyaṃ na syād arthena tat kṣayāt
T11dhkprvku:688: 03019 tan na kevala-sāmānya-agrahaṇād grahaṇe api vā
T11dhkprvku:690: 03020 nityatvāc ca yadi vyaktir vyakteḥ pratyakṣatāṃ prati
T11dhkprvku:691: 03021 ātmani jñāna-janane yac śaktaṃ śaktam eva tat
T11dhkprvku:692: 03021 atha aśaktaṃ kadācic ced aśaktaṃ sarvadā eva tat
T11dhkprvku:693: 03022 tasya śaktir aśaktir vā yā svabhāvena saṃsthitā
T11dhkprvku:694: 03022 nityatvād acikitsyasya kas tāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ
T11dhkprvku:696: 03023 nīla-ādy-ākāra-leśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:697: 03024 pratyakṣa-pratyaya-arthatvān na akṣāṇāṃ vyarthatā iti cet
T11dhkprvku:698: 03024 sā eva eka-rūpāc śabda-āder bhinna-ābhāsā matiḥ kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:699: 03025 na jātir jātimad vyakti-rūpaṃ yena apara-āśrayam
T11dhkprvku:700: 03025 siddhaṃ pṛthak cet kāryatvaṃ hy apekṣā ity abhidhīyate
T11dhkprvku:703: 03027 anyatve tad asambaddhaṃ siddhā ato niḥsvabhāvatā
T11dhkprvku:704: 03027 jāti-prasaṅgo abhāvasya na apekṣā abhāvatas tayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:707: 03029 tasyāṃ rūpa-avabhāso yas tattvena arthasya vā grahaḥ
T11dhkprvku:710: 03030 yan niṣṭhās ta ime śabdā na rūpaṃ tasya kiṃcana
T11dhkprvku:712: 03031 artha-bhrāntir api iṣyeta sāmānyaṃ sā apy abhiplavāt
T11dhkprvku:713: 03032 artha-rūpatayā tattvena abhāvāc ca na rūpiṇī
T11dhkprvku:715: 03033 yadi vastu na vastūnām avācyatvaṃ kathaṃcana
T11dhkprvku:719: 03035 upacārāt tad iṣṭaṃ ced vartamāna-ghaṭasya kā
T11dhkprvku:720: 03035 pratyāsattir abhāvena yā paṭa-ādau na vidyate
T11dhkprvku:722: 03036 siṃhe māṇavake tadvad ghoṣaṇā apy asti laukikī
T11dhkprvku:723: 03037 yatra rūḍhyā asad-artho api janaiḥ śabdo niveśitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:724: 03037 sa mukhyas tatra tat-sāmyād gauṇo anyatra skhalad gatiḥ
T11dhkprvku:725: 03038 yathābhāve apy abhāva-ākhyāṃ yathā-kalpanam eva vā
T11dhkprvku:726: 03038 kuryād aśakte śakte vā pradhāna-ādi-śrutiṃ janaḥ
T11dhkprvku:727: 03039 śabdebhyo yādṛśī buddhir naṣṭe anaṣṭe api dṛśyate
T11dhkprvku:728: 03039 tādṛśy eva sad-arthānāṃ na etac śrotṛ-ādi-cetasām
T11dhkprvku:730: 03040 tasya api kevalasya prāg grahaṇaṃ vinivāritam
T11dhkprvku:732: 03041 rūpaṃ dvirūpatāyāṃ vā tad-vastv ekaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
T11dhkprvku:733: 03042 tābhyāṃ tad-anyad eva syād yadi rūpaṃ samaṃ tayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:734: 03042 tayor iti na sambandho vyāvṛttis tu na duṣyate
T11dhkprvku:735: 03043 tasmāt samānatā eva asmin sāmānye avastu-lakṣaṇam
T11dhkprvku:736: 03043 kāryaṃ ca tad anekaṃ syān naśvaraṃ ca tan-matam
T11dhkprvku:739: 03045 yac ca vastu-balāj jñānaṃ jāyate tad apekṣyate
T11dhkprvku:740: 03045 na saṃketaṃ na sāmānya-buddhiṣv etad vibhāvyate
T11dhkprvku:741: 03046 yā apy abheda-anugā buddhiḥ kācid vastu-dvaye kṣaṇe
T11dhkprvku:744: 03047 jñāna-kāryeṣu jātir vā yayā anveti vibhāgataḥ
T11dhkprvku:746: 03048 yadi nāma indriyāṇāṃ syād draṣṭā bhāseta tad-vapuḥ
T11dhkprvku:748: 03049 vyakti-grahe ca tac śabda-rūpād anyan na dṛśyate
T11dhkprvku:750: 03050 tad ayogyatayā arūpaṃ tad hy avastuṣu lakṣaṇam
T11dhkprvku:754: 03052 na ukta-uttaratvād dṛṣṭatvād atīta-ādiṣu ca anyathā
T11dhkprvku:756: 03053 taj-jñānam ity adoṣo ayaṃ meyaṃ tv ekaṃ svalakṣaṇam
T11dhkprvku:760: 03055 gatiś cet pararūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā
T11dhkprvku:762: 03056 gatir apy anyathā dṛṣṭā pakṣaś ca ayaṃ kṛta-uttaraḥ
T11dhkprvku:768: 03059 tasya svatantraṃ grahaṇam ato anyad vastv atīndriyam
T11dhkprvku:770: 03060 tad-āśrayeṇa sambandhī yadi syād gamakas tadā
T11dhkprvku:772: 03061 tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣo artho viśeṣeṇa na gamyate
T11dhkprvku:773: 03062 yā ca sambandhino dharmād gatir dharmiṇi jāyate
T11dhkprvku:774: 03062 sā anumānaṃ parokṣāṇām ekaṃ tena eva sādhanam
T11dhkprvku:778: 03064 ekam eva aprameyatvād asataś cen mataṃ ca naḥ
T11dhkprvku:780: 03065 tan niścaya-pramāṇaṃ vā dvitīyaṃ na akṣajā matiḥ
T11dhkprvku:783: 03067 abhāve vinivṛttiś cet pratyakṣasya eva niścayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:784: 03067 viruddhaṃ sā eva vā liṅgam anvaya-vyatirekiṇī
T11dhkprvku:788: 03069 na āśvāsa iti cel liṅgaṃ durdṛṣṭer atad īdṛśam
T11dhkprvku:789: 03070 yataḥ kadācit siddhā asya pratītir vastunaḥ kvacit
T11dhkprvku:790: 03070 tad avaśyaṃ tato jātaṃ tat svabhāvo api vā bhavet
T11dhkprvku:791: 03071 sva-nimittaṃ svabhāvaṃ vā vinā na arthasya sambhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:792: 03071 yac ca rūpaṃ tayor dṛṣṭaṃ tad eva anyatra lakṣaṇam
T11dhkprvku:794: 03072 anyeṣu satsv adṛśye ca sattā vā tadvataḥ katham
T11dhkprvku:797: 03074 tac ca na indriya-śakty-ādāv akṣa-buddher asambhavāt
T11dhkprvku:800: 03075 vikalpena na sāmānya-grahas tasmiṃs tato anumā
T11dhkprvku:802: 03076 pramāṇam anyat tad buddhir vinā liṅgena sambhavāt
T11dhkprvku:804: 03077 tat pramāṇa-antaraṃ meya-bahutvād bahutā api vā
T11dhkprvku:805: 03078 pramāṇānām anekasya vṛtter ekatra vā yathā
T11dhkprvku:808: 03079 yojanād varṇa-sāmānye na ayaṃ doṣaḥ prasajyeta
T11dhkprvku:809: 03080 na avastu rūpaṃ tasya eva tathā siddhe prasādhanāt
T11dhkprvku:810: 03080 anyatra na anya-siddhiś cen na tasya eva prasiddhitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:811: 03081 yo hi bhāvo yathābhūto sa tādṛg liṅga-cetasaḥ
T11dhkprvku:812: 03081 hetus tajjā tathābhūte tasmād vastuni liṅgi-dhīḥ
T11dhkprvku:818: 03084 nimittaṃ tat svabhāvo vā kāraṇaṃ tac ca tad dhiyaḥ
T11dhkprvku:820: 03085 siddhiṃ pramāṇair vadatām arthād eva viparyayāt
T11dhkprvku:822: 03086 niṣedhe yā api tasya eva sā apramāṇatva-sūcanā
T11dhkprvku:823: 03087 anyathā ekasya bhāvasya sadbhāva-uktyā parasya tat
T11dhkprvku:824: 03087 na astitvaṃ kena gamyeta virodhāc ced asāv api
T11dhkprvku:825: 03088 siddhaḥ kena asahasthānād iti cet tat kuto matam
T11dhkprvku:826: 03088 dṛśyasya darśana-abhāvād iti cet sā apramāṇatā
T11dhkprvku:827: 03089 tasmāt sva-śabdena uktā api sā abhāvasya prasādhikā
T11dhkprvku:828: 03089 yasyā pramāṇaṃ sā avācyo niṣedhas tena sarvathā
T11dhkprvku:830: 03090 prayogaḥ kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ sarvatra artho na bhidyate
T11dhkprvku:831: 03091 viruddhaṃ tac ca sā upāyam avidhāyā api dhāya ca
T11dhkprvku:832: 03091 pramāṇa-uktir niṣedhe yā na sā nyāyānusāriṇī
T11dhkprvku:836: 03093 tādṛśo anupalabdheś ced ucyatāṃ sā eva sādhanam
T11dhkprvku:839: 03095 bhinno abhinno api vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujyate
T11dhkprvku:840: 03095 yathā agnir ahime sādhye sattā vā janma-bādhanī
T11dhkprvku:841: 03096 yathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sādhane sādhanaṃ matam
T11dhkprvku:842: 03096 tathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sva-nivṛttau nivartakam
T11dhkprvku:845: 03098 tatra api vyāpako dharmo nivṛtter gamako mataḥ
T11dhkprvku:847: 03099 yad apramāṇatā abhāve liṅgaṃ tasya eva kathyate
T11dhkprvku:850: 03100 tac ca hetau svabhāve vā adṛśye dṛśyatayā mate
T11dhkprvku:851: 03101 anumānād anitya-āder grahaṇe ayaṃ kramo mataḥ
T11dhkprvku:852: 03101 prāmāṇyam eva na anyatra gṛhīta-grahaṇān matam
T11dhkprvku:853: 03102 na anyās yā anityatā bhāvāt pūrva-siddhaḥ sa ca indriyāt
T11dhkprvku:854: 03102 na aneka-rūpo vācyo asau vācyo dharmo vikalpajaḥ
T11dhkprvku:856: 03103 tad-asiddhau tathā asya eva hy anumānaṃ pravartate
T11dhkprvku:866: 03108 buddhayo arthe pravartante abhinne bhinna-āśrayā iva
T11dhkprvku:867: 03109 yathā-codanam ākhyāś ca so asati bhrānti-kāraṇe
T11dhkprvku:869: 03110 siddho atra apy athavā dhvaṃso liṅgād anupalambhanāt
T11dhkprvku:870: 03110 prāg bhūtvā hy abhavad bhāvo anitya ity abhidhīyate
T11dhkprvku:872: 03111 anityatā śrutis tena tāvantāv iti kau smṛtau
T11dhkprvku:873: 03112 prāk paścād apy abhāvaś cet sa eva anityatā na kim
T11dhkprvku:874: 03112 ṣaṣṭhy-ādy-ayogād iti ced antayoḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet
T11dhkprvku:876: 03113 aviśeṣaṇam eva syād antau cet kārya-kāraṇe
T11dhkprvku:877: 03114 asambandhān na bhāvasya prāg-abhāvaṃ sa vāñchati
T11dhkprvku:878: 03114 tad-upādhi-samākhyāne te apy asya ca na sidhyataḥ
T11dhkprvku:880: 03115 sā sattā sa ca sambandho nityau kāryam atha iha kim
T11dhkprvku:881: 03116 yasya abhāvaḥ kriyeta asau na bhāvaḥ prāg-abhāvavān
T11dhkprvku:887: 03119 nidarśanaṃ tad eva iti sāmānya-agrahaṇaṃ yadi
T11dhkprvku:888: 03119 nidarśanatvāt siddhasya pramāṇena asya kiṃ punaḥ
T11dhkprvku:889: 03120 vismṛtatvād adoṣaś cet tad eva anidarśanam
T11dhkprvku:893: 03122 sandhīyamānaṃ ca anyena vyavasāyaṃ smṛtiṃ viduḥ
T11dhkprvku:894: 03122 tal-liṅga-apekṣaṇān no cet smṛtir na vyabhicārataḥ
T11dhkprvku:898: 03124 sthito api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate sā akṣajā matiḥ
T11dhkprvku:899: 03125 punar vikalpayan kiṃcid āsīn me kalpanā īdṛśī
T11dhkprvku:900: 03125 icchā ca iti na pūrva-ukta-avasthāyām indriyād gatau
T11dhkprvku:901: 03126 ekatra dṛṣṭo bhedo hi kvacin na anyatra dṛśyate
T11dhkprvku:902: 03126 na tasmāt bhinnam asty anyat sāmānyaṃ buddhy-abhedataḥ
T11dhkprvku:903: 03127 tasmād viśeṣa-viṣayā sarvā eva indriyajā matiḥ
T11dhkprvku:906: 03128 viṣayo yaś ca śabdānāṃ saṃyojyeta sa eva taiḥ
T11dhkprvku:907: 03129 asya idam iti sambandhe yāv arthau pratibhāsinau
T11dhkprvku:908: 03129 tayor eva hi sambandho na tadā indriya-gocaraḥ
T11dhkprvku:911: 03131 cakṣuṣo artha-avabhāse api yaṃ paro asya iti śaṃsati
T11dhkprvku:912: 03131 sa eva yojyate śabdairn na khalv indriya-gocaraḥ
T11dhkprvku:916: 03133 vimūḍho laghuvṛtter vā tayor aikyaṃ vyayasyati
T11dhkprvku:918: 03134 iti ced bhinna-jātīya-vikalpe anyasya vā katham
T11dhkprvku:920: 03135 anyatra api samānaṃ tad varṇayor vā sakṛc śrutiḥ
T11dhkprvku:921: 03136 sakṛt saṃgata-sarva-artheṣv indriyeṣv iha satsv api
T11dhkprvku:922: 03136 pañcabhir vyavadhāne api bhāty avyavahita iva yā
T11dhkprvku:924: 03137 vicchinna-ābhā iti tac citraṃ tasmāt santu sakṛd dhiyaḥ
T11dhkprvku:926: 03138 śuddhe mano-vikalpe ca na krama-grahaṇam bhavet
T11dhkprvku:927: 03139 yo agrahaḥ saṃgate apy arthe kvacid āsakta-cetasaḥ
T11dhkprvku:928: 03139 saktyā anya-utpatti-vaiguṇyāc codyaṃ vā etad dvayor api
T11dhkprvku:930: 03140 cakra-bhrāntiṃ dṛśā dhatte na dṛśāṃ ghaṭanena sā
T11dhkprvku:932: 03141 āhur bālā vikalpe ca hetuṃ saṃketa-mandatām
T11dhkprvku:933: 03142 teṣāṃ pratyakṣam eva syād bālānām avikalpanāt
T11dhkprvku:934: 03142 saṃketa-upāya-vigamāt paścād api bhaven na saḥ
T11dhkprvku:935: 03143 mano avyutpanna-saṃketam asti tena sa cen mataḥ
T11dhkprvku:936: 03143 evam indriyaje api syād śeṣavac ca idam īdṛśam
T11dhkprvku:937: 03144 yad eva sādhanaṃ bāle tad eva atra api kathyatām
T11dhkprvku:939: 03145 viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca sambandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim
T11dhkprvku:940: 03145 gṛhītvā saṃkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā
T11dhkprvku:942: 03146 tadvatā yojanā na asti kalpanā apy atra na asty ataḥ
T11dhkprvku:943: 03147 yady apy anvayi vijñānaṃ śabda-vyakty-avabhāsi tat
T11dhkprvku:945: 03148 samānatve api tasya eva na īkṣaṇaṃ netra-gocaram
T11dhkprvku:948: 03149 paṭas tantuṣv iha ity ādi-śabdāś ca ime svayaṃ kṛtāḥ
T11dhkprvku:949: 03150 śṛṅgaṅ gavi iti loke syāc śṛṅge gaur ity alaukikam
T11dhkprvku:951: 03151 tais tantubhir iyaṃ śāṭi ity uttaraṃ kāryam ucyate
T11dhkprvku:954: 03152 tantv-ākhyāṃ vartayet kārye darśayan na āśrayaṃ śruteḥ
T11dhkprvku:957: 03154 anumānaṃ ca jāty-ādau vastuno na asti bhedini
T11dhkprvku:958: 03154 sarvatra vyapadeśo hi daṇḍa-āder api sāṃvṛtāt
T11dhkprvku:960: 03155 geho yady api saṃyogas tan mālā kiṃ nu tad bhavet
T11dhkprvku:961: 03156 jātiś ced geha eko api mālā ity ucyeta vṛkṣa-vat
T11dhkprvku:962: 03156 mālā-bahutve tac śabdaḥ kathaṃ jāter ajātitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:963: 03157 mālā-ādau ca mahattva-ādir iṣṭo yaś ca aupacārikaḥ
T11dhkprvku:966: 03158 padārtha-śabdaḥ kaṃ hetum anyaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ samīkṣate
T11dhkprvku:967: 03159 yo yathā rūḍhitaḥ siddhas tat-sāmya-ādyas tathā ucyate
T11dhkprvku:968: 03159 mukhyo gauṇaś ca bhāveṣv apy abhāvasya upacārataḥ
T11dhkprvku:969: 03160 saṃketa-anvayinī rūḍhir vaktur icchā anvayī ca saḥ
T11dhkprvku:972: 03161 bhede api yatra taj-jñānāt tat tathā pratipadyate
T11dhkprvku:974: 03162 ity etat kārya-viśleṣasya anvayo na eka-vastunaḥ
T11dhkprvku:975: 03163 vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tan niṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ
T11dhkprvku:979: 03165 vyatirekī iva yaj jñāne bhāty artha-pratibimbakam
T11dhkprvku:980: 03165 śabdāt tad api na artha-ātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanā-udbhavā
T11dhkprvku:981: 03166 tasya abhidhāne śrutibhir arthe ko aṃśo avagamyate
T11dhkprvku:982: 03166 tasya agatau ca saṃketa-kriyā vyarthā tad arthikā
T11dhkprvku:983: 03167 śabdo artha-aṃśakam āha iti tatra anyāpoha ucyate
T11dhkprvku:984: 03167 ākāraḥ sa ca na arthe asti tam vadann artha-bhāk katham
T11dhkprvku:985: 03168 śabdasya anvayinaḥ kāryam arthena anvayinā sa ca
T11dhkprvku:988: 03169 śabda-artho arthaḥ sa eva iti vacanena virudhyate
T11dhkprvku:990: 03170 anuyānti imam artha-aṃśam iti vā apoha-kṛc śrutiḥ
T11dhkprvku:994: 03172 śrutau sambadhyate apoho na etad vastuni yujyate
T11dhkprvku:995: 03173 tasmāj jāty-ādi-tad-yogā na arthe teṣu ca na śrutiḥ
T11dhkprvku:999: 03175 anyatra gata-citto api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate
T11dhkprvku:1000: 03175 tat saṃketa-agrahas tatra spaṣṭas tajjā ca kalpanā
T11dhkprvku:1001: 03176 jāyante kalpanās tatra yatra śabdo niveśitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1002: 03176 tena icchātaḥ pravarteran na īkṣeran bāhyam akṣajāḥ
T11dhkprvku:1003: 03177 rūpaṃ rūpam iti īkṣeta tad dhiyaṃ kim iti īkṣate
T11dhkprvku:1004: 03177 asti ca anubhavas tasyāḥ so avikalpaḥ kathaṃ bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1005: 03178 tasya eva anubhave dṛṣṭaṃ na vikalpa-dvayaṃ sakṛt
T11dhkprvku:1007: 03179 smṛtir bhaved atīte ca sā agṛhīte kathaṃ bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1010: 03180 siddhaṃ tat kena tasmin hi na pratyakṣaṃ na laiṅgikam
T11dhkprvku:1012: 03181 rūpa-ādir iva gṛhyeta na syāt tat pūrva-dhī-grahaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1015: 03183 sāmānya-vācinaḥ śabdās tad eka-arthā ca kalpanā
T11dhkprvku:1017: 03184 asti cen nirvikalpaṃ ca kiṃcit tat-tulya-hetukam
T11dhkprvku:1018: 03184 sarvan tathā eva hetor hi bhedād bhedaḥ phala-ātmanām
T11dhkprvku:1020: 03185 tathā anapekṣya samayaṃ vastu-śaktyā eva netra-dhīḥ
T11dhkprvku:1022: 03186 anapekṣya na cec śakyaṃ syāt smṛtāv eva liṅga-vat
T11dhkprvku:1023: 03187 tasyās tat-saṃgama-utpatter akṣa-dhīḥ syāt smṛter na vā
T11dhkprvku:1024: 03187 tataḥ kāla-antare api syāt kvacid vyākṣepa-sambhavāt
T11dhkprvku:1025: 03188 krameṇa ubhaya-hetuś cet prāg eva syād abhedataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1026: 03188 anyo akṣa-buddhi-hetuś cet smṛtis tatra apy anarthikā
T11dhkprvku:1028: 03189 bhedaś ca asamito grāhyaḥ smṛtis tatra kim arthikā
T11dhkprvku:1030: 03190 tasmāc cakṣuś ca rūpāṃ ca pratītya udeti netra-dhīḥ
T11dhkprvku:1031: 03191 sākṣāc cet jñāna-janane samartho viṣayo akṣa-vat
T11dhkprvku:1032: 03191 atha kasmād dvaya-adhīna-janma tat tena na ucyate
T11dhkprvku:1033: 03192 samīkṣya gamakatvaṃ hi vyapadeśo na gṛhyate
T11dhkprvku:1034: 03192 tac ca akṣa-vyapadeśe asti tad-dharmaś ca niyojyatām
T11dhkprvku:1037: 03194 saṃcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ tatra ca akṣa-dhīḥ
T11dhkprvku:1040: 03195 uktās te saṃcitās te hi nimittāṃ jñāna-janmanaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1041: 03196 aṇūnāṃ sa viśeṣaś ca na antareṇa aparān aṇūn
T11dhkprvku:1043: 03197 atha eka-āyatanatve api na anekaṃ dṛśyate sakṛt
T11dhkprvku:1045: 03198 pratyuktaṃ lāghavaṃ ca atra teṣv eva krama-pātiṣu
T11dhkprvku:1046: 03198 kim na akrama-grahas tulya-kālāḥ sarvāś ca buddhayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1047: 03199 kāścit tāsv akrama-ābhāsāḥ kramavatyo aparāś ca kim
T11dhkprvku:1049: 03200 na ekaṃ citra-pataṃga-ādi rūpaṃ vā dṛśyate katham
T11dhkprvku:1050: 03200 citraṃ tad ekam iti ced idaṃ citrataraṃ tataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1051: 03201 na ekaṃ svabhāvaṃ citraṃ hi maṇi-rūpaṃ yathā eva tat
T11dhkprvku:1053: 03202 tatra avayava-rūpaṃ cet kevalaṃ dṛśyate tathā
T11dhkprvku:1054: 03202 nīla-ādīni nirasya anyac citraṃ citraṃ yad īkṣase
T11dhkprvku:1056: 03203 nānā-arthā kramavatyā ekā kim eka-arthā akramā aparā
T11dhkprvku:1058: 03204 tac ced anaṅgaṃ kena iyaṃ siddhā bheda-vyavasthitiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1060: 03205 arūpatvān na saṃyogaś citro bhakteś ca na āśrayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1063: 03207 nānā-arthā ekā bhavet tasmāt siddhānto apy avikalpikā
T11dhkprvku:1064: 03207 vikalpayann apy eka-arthaṃ yato anyad api paśyati
T11dhkprvku:1065: 03208 citra-avabhāseṣv artheṣu yady ekatvaṃ na yujyate
T11dhkprvku:1066: 03208 sā eva tāvat kathaṃ buddhir ekā citra-avabhāsinī
T11dhkprvku:1068: 03209 yathā yathārthāś cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā
T11dhkprvku:1069: 03210 kiṃ syāt sā citratā ekasyāṃ na syāt tasyāṃ matāv api
T11dhkprvku:1070: 03210 yadi idaṃ svayam arthānāṃ rocate tatra ke vayaṃ
T11dhkprvku:1071: 03211 tasmān na artheṣu na jñāne sthūla-bhāsas tadātmanaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1072: 03211 ekatra pratiṣiddhatvād bahuṣv api na sambhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1073: 03212 paricchedo antar anyo ayaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1075: 03213 tatra ekasya apy abhāvena dvayam apy avahīyate
T11dhkprvku:1076: 03213 tasmāt tad eva tasya api tattvaṃ yā dvaya-śūnyatā
T11dhkprvku:1078: 03214 tad-upaplava-bhāve ca teṣāṃ bhedo apy upaplavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1082: 03216 lakṣaṇaṃ sa ca tattvaṃ na tena apy ete vilakṣaṇāḥ
T11dhkprvku:1090: 03220 aśakya-darśanas taṃ hi pataty arthe vivecayan
T11dhkprvku:1091: 03221 yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathā eva prakāśate
T11dhkprvku:1092: 03221 iti nāma eka-bhāvaḥ syāc citra-ākārasya cetasi
T11dhkprvku:1094: 03222 vivekī na vivakṣā anyad avivekī ca na īkṣate
T11dhkprvku:1095: 03223 ko vā virodho bahavaḥ saṃjāta-atiśayāḥ pṛthak
T11dhkprvku:1096: 03223 bhaveyuḥ kāraṇaṃ buddher yadi na ātma-indriya-ādi-vat
T11dhkprvku:1097: 03224 hetu-bhāvād ṛte na anyā grāhyatā nāma kācana
T11dhkprvku:1098: 03224 tatra buddhir yad ābhāsā tasyās tad-grāhyam ucyate
T11dhkprvku:1099: 03225 kathaṃ vā avayavī grāhyaḥ sakṛt sva-avayavaiḥ saha
T11dhkprvku:1100: 03225 na hi go-pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ sāsnā-ādīnām adarśane
T11dhkprvku:1102: 03226 sampūrṇa-aṅgo na gṛhyeta sakṛn na api guṇa-ādimān
T11dhkprvku:1104: 03227 yad aṅga-bhāvena upāttan tat tena eva hi gṛhyate
T11dhkprvku:1106: 03228 agrahād bheda-buddhiḥ syāt paśyato apy aparāparam
T11dhkprvku:1108: 03229 astu nāma tathā apy eṣāṃ bhavet sambandhi-saṃkaraḥ
T11dhkprvku:1115: 03233 yady apy asti sitatva-ādir yādṛg indriya-gocaraḥ
T11dhkprvku:1116: 03233 na so abhidhīyate śabdair jñānayo rūpa-bhedataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1117: 03234 eka-arthatve api buddhīnāṃ nānā-āśrayatā sa cet
T11dhkprvku:1118: 03234 śrotṛ-ādi-cittāni idānīṃ bhinna-arthāni iti tat kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1119: 03235 jāto nāma āśrayo anyonyaḥ cetasāṃ tasya vastunaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1120: 03235 ekasya eva kuto rūpaṃ bhinna-ākāra-avabhāsi tat
T11dhkprvku:1124: 03237 dṛśye gava-ādau jāty-ādes tad apy etena dūṣitam
T11dhkprvku:1125: 03238 darśanāny eva bhinnāny apy ekāṃ kurvanti kalpanām
T11dhkprvku:1129: 03240 kṣaṇikatvād atītasya darśane ca na sambhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1132: 03241 karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim iti iṣyate
T11dhkprvku:1133: 03242 sakṛd bhāvaś ca sarvāsāṃ dhiyāṃ tadbhāva-janmanām
T11dhkprvku:1136: 03243 mano anyam eva gṛhṇāti viṣayaṃ na andhadṛk tataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1138: 03244 tato anya-grahaṇe apy asya niyata-grāhyatā matā
T11dhkprvku:1140: 03245 sahakāri bhaved artha iti ced akṣa-cetasaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1141: 03246 asataḥ prāg asāmarthyāt paścāc ca anupayogataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1142: 03246 prāgbhāvaḥ sarva-hetūnāṃ na ato arthaḥ sva-dhiyā saha
T11dhkprvku:1143: 03247 bhinna-kālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyam iti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ
T11dhkprvku:1145: 03248 kāryaṃ hy aneka-hetutve apy anukurvad udeti yat
T11dhkprvku:1146: 03248 tat tena arpita-tad-rūpaṃ gṛhītam iti ca ucyate
T11dhkprvku:1149: 03250 avedakāḥ parasya api te svarūpaṃ kathaṃ viduḥ
T11dhkprvku:1153: 03252 sā arthe sati indriye yogye yathāsvam api cetasi
T11dhkprvku:1154: 03252 dṛṣṭaṃ janma sukha-ādīnāṃ tat-tulyaṃ manasām api
T11dhkprvku:1155: 03253 asatsu satsu ca eteṣu na janma-ajanma vā kvacit
T11dhkprvku:1156: 03253 dṛṣṭaṃ sukha-āder buddher vā ta tato na anyataś ca te
T11dhkprvku:1159: 03255 yasya arthasya nipātena te jātā dhī-sukha-ādayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1160: 03255 taṃ muktvā pratipadyeta sukha-ādīn eva sā katham
T11dhkprvku:1162: 03256 tal-lāghavāc cet tat-tulyam ity asaṃvedanaṃ na kim
T11dhkprvku:1163: 03257 na ca ekayā dvaya-jñānaṃ niyamād akṣa-cetasaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1164: 03257 sukha-ādy-abhāve apy arthāc ca jāteḥ tac śakty-asiddhitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1165: 03258 pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayor nīla-ādi-vat sukham
T11dhkprvku:1167: 03259 na hi saṃvedanaṃ yuktam arthena eva saha-grahe
T11dhkprvku:1168: 03259 kiṃ sāmarthyaṃ sukha-ādīnāṃ na iṣṭā dhīr yat tad udbhavā
T11dhkprvku:1170: 03260 rūpa-ādiḥ stry-ādi-bhedo akṣaṇā na gṛhyeta kadācana
T11dhkprvku:1171: 03261 na hi saty antaraṅge arthe śakter dhīr bāhya-darśanī
T11dhkprvku:1175: 03263 saty āntare apy upādāne jñāne duḥkha-ādi-sambhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1176: 03263 na upādānaṃ viruddhasya tac ca ekam iti cen matam
T11dhkprvku:1178: 03264 ādhipatyaṃ tu kurvīta tad-viruddhe api dṛśyate
T11dhkprvku:1182: 03266 vedakāḥ svātmanaś ca eṣām arthebhyo janma kevalam
T11dhkprvku:1183: 03267 artha-ātmā svātmabhūto hi teṣāṃ tair anubhūyate
T11dhkprvku:1185: 03268 kaścid bahiḥ sthitān eva sukha-ādīn apracetanān
T11dhkprvku:1186: 03268 grāhyān āha na tasya api sakṛd yukto dvaya-grahaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1188: 03269 bhinna-avabhāsinor grāhyaṃ cetasos tad abhedi kim
T11dhkprvku:1190: 03270 tāratamyaṃ ca buddhau syān na prīti-paritāpayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:1192: 03271 sa idānīṃ kathaṃ bāhyaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmā iti gamyate
T11dhkprvku:1194: 03272 agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tato hīyeta bhoktṛtā
T11dhkprvku:1196: 03273 grāhyagrāhakatā-abhāvād bhāve anyatra api sā bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1197: 03274 tasmāt ta āntarā eva saṃvedyatvāc ca cetanāḥ
T11dhkprvku:1198: 03274 saṃvedanaṃ na yad rūpaṃ na hi tat tasya vedanam
T11dhkprvku:1199: 03275 atat-svabhāvo anubhavo bauddhāṃs tān samavaiti cet
T11dhkprvku:1200: 03275 muktvā adhyakṣa-smṛta-ākārāṃ saṃvittiṃ buddhir atra kā
T11dhkprvku:1202: 03276 ekam āvirbhavad dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tv anyad antarā
T11dhkprvku:1205: 03278 abhinna-vedanasya aikye yan na evaṃ tad-vibheda-vat
T11dhkprvku:1206: 03278 sidhyed asādhanatve asya na siddhaṃ bheda-sādhanam
T11dhkprvku:1208: 03279 abhinna-ābhe vibhinne ced bheda-abhedau kim āśrayau
T11dhkprvku:1211: 03281 prāguktaṃ yogināṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhāvanām ayam
T11dhkprvku:1214: 03282 abhūtān api paśyanti purato avasthitān iva
T11dhkprvku:1216: 03283 svapne api smaryate smārtaṃ ca tat tādṛg arthavat
T11dhkprvku:1219: 03285 tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yad yad eva abhibhāvyate
T11dhkprvku:1221: 03286 tatra pramāṇaṃ saṃvādi yat prāṅ nirṇīta-vastu-vat
T11dhkprvku:1223: 03287 śabda-artha-grāhi yad yatra taj-jñānaṃ tatra kalpanā
T11dhkprvku:1224: 03287 svarūpaṃ ca na śabda-arthas tatra adhyakṣam ato akhilam
T11dhkprvku:1234: 03292 na pratyayo anuyaṃs tac ca pratyakṣāt parihīyate
T11dhkprvku:1235: 03293 apavādaś caturtho atra tena uktam upaghātajam
T11dhkprvku:1237: 03294 mānasaṃ tad api ity eke teṣāṃ grantho virudhyate
T11dhkprvku:1238: 03294 nīla-dvi-candra-ādi-dhiyāṃ hetur akṣāṇy api ity ayam
T11dhkprvku:1241: 03296 kiṃ vā aindriyaṃ yad akṣāṇāṃ bhāva-abhāva-anurodhi cet
T11dhkprvku:1242: 03296 tat-tulyaṃ vikriyā-vac cet sā iva iyaṃ kiṃ niṣidhyate
T11dhkprvku:1243: 03297 sarpa-ādi-bhrānti-vac ca asyāḥ syād akṣa-vikṛtāv api
T11dhkprvku:1244: 03297 nivṛttir na nivarteta nivṛtte apy akṣa-viplave
T11dhkprvku:1245: 03298 kadācid anya-santāne tathā eva apy eta vācakaiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1247: 03299 suptasya jāgrato vā api yā eva dhīḥ sphuṭa-bhāsinī
T11dhkprvku:1248: 03299 sā nirvikalpa-ubhayathā apy anyathā eva vikalpikā
T11dhkprvku:1249: 03300 tasmāt tasya avikalpe api prāmāṇyaṃ pratiṣidhyate
T11dhkprvku:1250: 03300 visaṃvādāt tad-arthaṃ ca pratyakṣa-ābhaṃ dvidhā uditam
T11dhkprvku:1251: 03301 kriyā-sādhanam ity eva sarvaṃ sarvasya karmaṇaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1252: 03301 sādhanaṃ na hi tat tasyāḥ sādhanaṃ yā kriyā yataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1254: 03302 bhāvyaṃ tena ātmanā yena pratikarma vibhajyate
T11dhkprvku:1255: 03303 anātmabhūto bhedo asya vidyamāno api hetuṣu
T11dhkprvku:1256: 03303 bhinne karmaṇy abhinnasya na bhedena niyāmakaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1257: 03304 tasmād yato asya ātma-bhedo asya adhigatir ity ayam
T11dhkprvku:1259: 03305 arthena ghaṭayaty enāṃ na hi muktvā artha-rūpatām
T11dhkprvku:1260: 03305 anyaḥ sva-bhedāj jñānasya bhedako api kathaṃcana
T11dhkprvku:1263: 03307 sā ca tasya ātmabhūtā eva tena na artha-antaraṃ phalam
T11dhkprvku:1264: 03307 dadhānaṃ tac ca tām ātmany artha-adhigamana-ātmanā
T11dhkprvku:1270: 03310 na iṣṭaṃ prāmāṇyam eteṣāṃ vyavadhānāt kriyāṃ prati
T11dhkprvku:1271: 03311 sarveṣām upayoge api kārakāṇāṃ kriyāṃ prati
T11dhkprvku:1272: 03311 yad antyaṃ bhedakaṃ tasyās tat-sādhakatamaṃ matam
T11dhkprvku:1274: 03312 tad-bhede api hy abhinnasya tasya idam iti tat kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1276: 03313 atādrūpye na bhedo api tadvad anya-dhiyo api vā
T11dhkprvku:1277: 03314 na iṣṭo viṣaya-bhedo api kriyā-sādhanayor dvayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:1278: 03314 eka-arthatve dvayaṃ vyarthaṃ na ca syāt krama-bhāvitā
T11dhkprvku:1281: 03316 sarva-ātmanā api sambaddhaṃ kaiścid eva avagamyate
T11dhkprvku:1282: 03316 dharmaiḥ sa niyamo na syāt sambandhasya aviśeṣataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1283: 03317 tad abhede api bhedo ayaṃ yasmāt tasya pramāṇatā
T11dhkprvku:1284: 03317 saṃskārāc ced atādrūpye na tasya apy avyavasthiteḥ
T11dhkprvku:1289: 03320 kā artha saṃvid yad eva idaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prativedanam
T11dhkprvku:1291: 03321 atha so anubhavaḥ kva asya tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
T11dhkprvku:1292: 03321 sarūpavanti tat kena sthūla-ābhāsaś ca te aṇavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1297: 03324 idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedam iti yatra avasāya-dhīḥ
T11dhkprvku:1298: 03324 sa tasya anubhavaḥ sā eva pratyāsattir vicāryate
T11dhkprvku:1300: 03325 tayoḥ sambandham āśritya draṣṭur eṣa viniścayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1301: 03326 ātmā sa tasya anubhavaḥ sa ca na anyasya kasyacit
T11dhkprvku:1303: 03327 na anyo anubhāvyas tena asti tasya na anubhavo paraḥ
T11dhkprvku:1304: 03327 tasya api tulya-codyatvāt svayaṃ sā eva prakāśate
T11dhkprvku:1305: 03328 nīla-ādi-rūpas tasya asau svabhāvo anubhavaś ca saḥ
T11dhkprvku:1308: 03329 yathā prakāśo abhimatas tathā dhīr ātma-vedinī
T11dhkprvku:1309: 03330 tasyāś ca artha-antare vedye durghaṭau vedya-vedakau
T11dhkprvku:1314: 03332 tadā anya-saṃvido abhāvāt svasaṃvit phalam iṣyate
T11dhkprvku:1315: 03333 yadi bāhyo anubhūyeta ko doṣo na eva kaścana
T11dhkprvku:1316: 03333 idam eva kim uktaṃ syāt sa bāhyo artho anubhūyeta
T11dhkprvku:1317: 03334 yadi buddhis tad-ākārā sā asty ākāra-niveśinī
T11dhkprvku:1318: 03334 sā bāhyād anyato vā iti vicāram idam arhati
T11dhkprvku:1320: 03335 darśanaṃ nīla-nirbhāsaṃ na artho bāhyo asti kevalaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1323: 03337 tasmād dvi-rūpam asty ekaṃ yad evam anubhūyate
T11dhkprvku:1324: 03337 smaryate ca ubhaya-ākārasya asya saṃvedanaṃ phalam
T11dhkprvku:1325: 03338 yadā niṣpanna-tadbhāva iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā paraḥ
T11dhkprvku:1326: 03338 vijñapti-hetur viṣayas tasyāś ca anubhavas tathā
T11dhkprvku:1328: 03339 tadā ya ātma-anubhavaḥ sa eva artha-viniścayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1329: 03340 yadi iṣṭa-ākāra ātmā syād anyathā vā anubhūyate
T11dhkprvku:1330: 03340 iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā tena bhavaty arthaḥ praveditaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1331: 03341 vidyamāne api bāhya-arthe yathānubhavam eva saḥ
T11dhkprvku:1333: 03342 yadi bāhyaṃ na vidyeta kasya saṃvedanaṃ bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1334: 03342 yady agatyā svarūpasya bāhyasya eva na kiṃ matam
T11dhkprvku:1335: 03343 abhyupāye api bhedena na syād anubhavo dvayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:1336: 03343 adṛṣṭa-āvaraṇān no cen na nāma-artha-vaśā gatiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1338: 03344 tad adṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma bhaved arthasya vedakam
T11dhkprvku:1340: 03345 aniṣṭa-ādāv asandhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatra api cetasām
T11dhkprvku:1341: 03346 tasmāt prameye bāhye api yuktaṃ sva-anubhavaḥ phalam
T11dhkprvku:1342: 03346 yataḥ svabhāvo asya yathā tathā eva artha-viniścayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1343: 03347 tadā artha-ābhāsatā eva asya pramāṇaṃ na tu sann api
T11dhkprvku:1345: 03348 yasmād yathā niviṣṭo asāv artha-ātmā pratyaye tathā
T11dhkprvku:1346: 03348 niścīyate niviṣṭo asāv evam ity ātma-saṃvidaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1347: 03349 ity artha-saṃvit sā eva iṣṭā yato artha-ātmā na dṛśyate
T11dhkprvku:1348: 03349 tasyā buddhi-niveśya-arthaḥ sādhanaṃ tasya sā kriyā
T11dhkprvku:1349: 03350 yathā niviśate so arthaḥ tathā hi sa prakāśate
T11dhkprvku:1350: 03350 artha-sthites tadātmatvāt svavid apy arthavin matā
T11dhkprvku:1351: 03351 tasmād viṣaya-bhedo api na svasaṃvedanaṃ phalam
T11dhkprvku:1353: 03352 tathā avabhāsamānasya tādṛśo anya-adṛśo api vā
T11dhkprvku:1354: 03352 jñānasya hetur artho api ity arthasya iṣṭā prameyatā
T11dhkprvku:1355: 03353 yathā kathaṃcin na asya artha-rūpaṃ yuktyā avabhāsinaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1361: 03356 dūre yathā vā maruṣu mahān alpo api dṛśyate
T11dhkprvku:1365: 03358 satyaṃ kathaṃ syur ākārās tad ekatvasya hānitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1366: 03359 anyasya anyatva-hāneś ca na abhedo arūpa-darśanāt
T11dhkprvku:1367: 03359 rūpa-abhedaṃ hi paśyantī dhīr abhedaṃ vyavasyati
T11dhkprvku:1368: 03360 bhāvā yena nirūpyante tad-rūpaṃ na asti tattvataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1369: 03360 yasmād ekam anekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate
T11dhkprvku:1372: 03362 adarśanāj jagat yasminn ekasya api tadātmanaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1373: 03362 asti iyam api yā tv antar upaplava-samudbhavā
T11dhkprvku:1377: 03364 tādātmyād ātmavit tasya sa tasyā sādhanaṃ tataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1380: 03366 tatra apy anubhava-ātmatvāt te yogyāḥ svātmasaṃvidi
T11dhkprvku:1381: 03366 iti sā yogyatā mānam ātmā meyaḥ phalaṃ svavit
T11dhkprvku:1383: 03367 sā yogyatā iti ca proktaṃ pramāṇaṃ svātmavedanam
T11dhkprvku:1384: 03368 sarvam eva hi vijñānaṃ viṣayebhyaḥ samudbhavat
T11dhkprvku:1385: 03368 tad-anyasya api hetutve kathaṃ syād viṣaya-ākṛtiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1387: 03369 pitros tad ekasya ākāraṃ dhatte na anyasya kasyacit
T11dhkprvku:1389: 03370 viṣayatvaṃ tad-aṅgena tad-abhāve na tad bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1393: 03372 sā vā anityā na jātiḥ syān nityā vā janikā katham
T11dhkprvku:1394: 03373 nāma-ādikaṃ niṣiddhaṃ prāṅ na ayam arthavatāṃ kramaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1396: 03374 smṛtiś ca īdṛgvidhaṃ jñānaṃ tasyāś ca anubhavād bhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1397: 03374 sa ca artha-ākāra-rahitaḥ sā idānīṃ tadvatī katham
T11dhkprvku:1398: 03375 na arthād bhāvas tadā abhāvāt syāt tathā anubhave api saḥ
T11dhkprvku:1399: 03375 ākāraḥ sa ca na arthasya spaṣṭa-ākāra-vivekataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1400: 03376 vyatiriktaṃ tam ākāraṃ pratīyād aparas tathā
T11dhkprvku:1401: 03376 nityam ātmani sambandhe pratīyāt kathitaṃ ca na
T11dhkprvku:1402: 03377 ekā ekena abhisambandhe pratisandhir na yujyate
T11dhkprvku:1405: 03378 bhinna-ātma-arthaḥ kathaṃ grāhyas tadā syād dhīr anarthikā
T11dhkprvku:1408: 03380 anyathā hy atad-ākāraṃ kathaṃ jñāne adhirohati
T11dhkprvku:1409: 03380 eka-ākāra-uttaraṃ jñānaṃ tathā hy uttaram uttaram
T11dhkprvku:1410: 03381 tasya artha-rūpeṇa ākārāv ātma-ākāraś ca kaścana
T11dhkprvku:1413: 03382 bhrāntyā saṅkalanaṃ jyotir manaskāre ca sā bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1414: 03383 sarveṣām api kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1417: 03384 sārūpyāt tat kim anyat syād dṛṣṭeś ca yamala-ādiṣu
T11dhkprvku:1422: 03387 anyathā hy ādyam eva ekaṃ saṃyojyeta artha-sambhavāt
T11dhkprvku:1425: 03388 viṣayasya tato anyatvaṃ kena ākāreṇa sidhyati
T11dhkprvku:1426: 03389 bhedaś ca bhrānti-vijñānair dṛśyeta indāv iva advaye
T11dhkprvku:1428: 03390 na artho asaṃvedanaḥ kaścid anarthasya api vedanam
T11dhkprvku:1429: 03390 dṛṣṭaṃ saṃvedyamānaṃ tat tayor na asti vivekitā
T11dhkprvku:1432: 03392 abhāvād akṣa-buddhīnāṃ satsv apy anyeṣu hetuṣu
T11dhkprvku:1433: 03392 niyamaṃ yadi na brūyāt pratyayāt samanantarāt
T11dhkprvku:1437: 03394 buddhir āśritya kalpyeta yadi kiṃ vā virudhyate
T11dhkprvku:1438: 03395 anagni-janyo dhūmaḥ syāt tat-kāryāt kāraṇe agatiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1439: 03395 na syāt kāraṇatāyāṃ vā kuta ekāntato gatiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1441: 03396 gamayed agni-nirbhāsāṃ dhiyam eva na pāvakam
T11dhkprvku:1443: 03397 vyanakti citta-santāno dhiyaṃ dhūmo agnitas tataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1444: 03398 asty eṣa viduṣāṃ vādo bāhyaṃ tv āśritya varṇyate
T11dhkprvku:1449: 03400 sarvaṃ tad-artham arthāc cet tasya na asti tad-ābhatā
T11dhkprvku:1451: 03401 tasya kenacid aṃśena parato api bhidā bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1452: 03402 tathā hy āśritya pitaraṃ tad-rūpo api sutaḥ pituḥ
T11dhkprvku:1457: 03404 bhūtaṃ paśyaṃś ca tad-darśī kathaṃ ca upahata-indriyaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1458: 03405 śodhitaṃ timireṇa asya vyaktaṃ cakṣur atīndriyam
T11dhkprvku:1459: 03405 paśyato anya-akṣa-dṛśye arthe tad-avyaktaṃ kathaṃ punaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1461: 03406 śaktir hetus tato na anyo ahetuś ca viṣayaḥ katham
T11dhkprvku:1462: 03407 sa eva yadi dhī-hetuḥ kiṃ pradīpam apekṣate
T11dhkprvku:1463: 03407 dīpa-mātreṇa sadbhāvād ubhayaṃ na api kāraṇam
T11dhkprvku:1465: 03408 tat syād āloka-bhedāc cet tat pidhāna-apidhānayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:1466: 03409 tulyā dṛṣṭir adṛṣṭir vā sūkṣmo aṃśas tasya kaścana
T11dhkprvku:1467: 03409 ālokena na mandena dṛśyate ato bhidā yadi
T11dhkprvku:1471: 03411 bhinne anyasminn abhinnasya kuto bhedena bhāsanam
T11dhkprvku:1472: 03412 mandaṃ tad api tejaḥ kim āvṛtter iha sā na kim
T11dhkprvku:1473: 03412 tanutvāt tejaso apy etad asty anyatra apy atānavam
T11dhkprvku:1474: 03413 atyāsanne ca suvyaktaṃ tejas tat syād atisphuṭam
T11dhkprvku:1475: 03413 tatra apy adṛṣṭam āśritya bhaved rūpa-antaraṃ yadi
T11dhkprvku:1476: 03414 anyonya-āvaraṇāt teṣāṃ syāt tejo vihatis tataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1477: 03414 tatra ekam eva dṛśyeta tasya anāvaraṇe sakṛt
T11dhkprvku:1478: 03415 paśyet sphuṭa-asphuṭaṃ rūpam eko adṛṣṭena vāraṇe
T11dhkprvku:1479: 03415 artha-anarthau na yena stas tad-adṛṣṭaṃ karoti kim
T11dhkprvku:1484: 03418 vyaktiḥ kuto asatāṃ jñānād anyasya anupakāriṇaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1485: 03418 vyaktau vyajyeta sarvo arthas tad-hetor niyamo yadi
T11dhkprvku:1486: 03419 na eṣā api kalpanā jñāne jñānaṃ tv artha-avabhāsataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1487: 03419 taṃ vyanakti iti kathyeta tad-abhāve api tat-kṛtam
T11dhkprvku:1488: 03420 na ākārayati ca anyo artho anupakārāt saha-uditaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1489: 03420 vyakto na ākārayan jñānaṃ sva-ākāreṇa kathaṃ bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1490: 03421 vajra-upala-ādir apy arthaḥ sthiraḥ so anya-anapekṣaṇāt
T11dhkprvku:1491: 03421 sakṛt sarvasya janayej jñānāni jagataḥ samam
T11dhkprvku:1493: 03422 āhuḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedaṃ sa doṣo atra api pūrvavat
T11dhkprvku:1494: 03423 saṃvedanasya tādātmye na vivādo asti kasyacit
T11dhkprvku:1495: 03423 tasya artha-rūpatā siddhā sā api sidhyati saṃsmṛteḥ
T11dhkprvku:1497: 03424 evam etan na khalv evam iti sā syān na bhedinī
T11dhkprvku:1498: 03425 na ca anubhava-mātreṇa kaścid bhedo vivecakaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1499: 03425 vivekinī na ca aspaṣṭa-bhede dhīr yamala-ādi-vat
T11dhkprvku:1502: 03427 dhiyā atadrūpayā jñāne niruddhe anubhavaḥ kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1503: 03427 svaṃ ca rūpaṃ na sā vetti ity utsanno anubhavo arthinaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1504: 03428 bahir mukhaṃ ca taj-jñānaṃ bhāty artha-pratibhāsa-vat
T11dhkprvku:1505: 03428 buddheś ca grāhikā buddhir nityam antarmukhā-ātmani
T11dhkprvku:1506: 03429 yo yasya viṣaya-ābhāsas taṃ vetti na tad ity api
T11dhkprvku:1507: 03429 prāptā kā saṃvid anyā asti tādrūpyād iti cen matam
T11dhkprvku:1509: 03430 buddhiḥ sarūpā tad-vic cet na idānīṃ vit-sarūpikā
T11dhkprvku:1510: 03431 svayaṃ so anubhavas tasyā na sa sārūpya-kāraṇaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1514: 03433 dhiyo nīla-ādi-rūpatve bāhyo arthaḥ kiṃ pramāṇakaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1515: 03433 dhiyo anīla-ādi-rūpatve sa tasya anubhavaḥ katham
T11dhkprvku:1517: 03434 siddhaṃ tat svata eva asya kim arthena upanīyate
T11dhkprvku:1518: 03435 sarvātmanā hi sārūpye jñānam ajñānatāṃ vrajet
T11dhkprvku:1519: 03435 sāmye kenacid aṅgena syāt sarvaṃ sarva-vedanam
T11dhkprvku:1521: 03436 tathā anubhava-rūpatvāt tasya apy anubhavo bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1522: 03437 na anubhūto anubhava ity artha-vat tad-viniścayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1523: 03437 tasmād adoṣa iti cet na arthe apy asty eṣa sarvadā
T11dhkprvku:1524: 03438 kasmād vā anubhave na asti sati sattā-nibandhane
T11dhkprvku:1525: 03438 api ca idaṃ yad ābhāti dṛśyamāne sita-ādike
T11dhkprvku:1527: 03439 tat kiṃ sita-ādy-abhivyakteḥ pararūpam atha ātmanaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1528: 03440 pararūpe aprakāśāyāṃ vyaktau vyaktaṃ kathaṃ sitam
T11dhkprvku:1529: 03440 jñānaṃ vyaktir na sā vyaktā ity avyaktam akhilaṃ jagat
T11dhkprvku:1531: 03441 dṛṣṭyā ca ajñāta-sambandhaṃ viśinaṣṭi tayā katham
T11dhkprvku:1532: 03442 yasmād dvayor eka-gatau na dvitīyasya darśanam
T11dhkprvku:1533: 03442 dvayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayor dṛṣṭau syād dṛṣṭam iti niścayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1534: 03443 sarūpaṃ darśanaṃ yasya dṛśyate anyena cetasā
T11dhkprvku:1535: 03443 dṛṣṭa-ākhyā tatra cet siddhaṃ sārūpye asya svavedanam
T11dhkprvku:1536: 03444 atha ātma-rūpan no vetti pararūpasya vit katham
T11dhkprvku:1537: 03444 sārūpyād vedanā-ākhyā ca prāg eva pratipāditā
T11dhkprvku:1538: 03445 dṛṣṭayor eva sārūpya-graho arthaṃ ca na dṛṣṭavān
T11dhkprvku:1539: 03445 prāk kathaṃ darśanena asya sārūpyaṃ so adhyavasyati
T11dhkprvku:1540: 03446 sārūpyam api na icched yaḥ tasya na ubhaya-darśanam
T11dhkprvku:1541: 03446 tadā artho jñānam iti ca jñāte ca iti gatā kathā
T11dhkprvku:1542: 03447 atha svarūpaṃ sā tarhi svayam eva prakāśate
T11dhkprvku:1543: 03447 yat tasyām aprakāśāyām arthaḥ syād aprakāśitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1545: 03448 apratyakṣāṃ dhiyaṃ prāhus te api nirvarṇita-uttarāḥ
T11dhkprvku:1548: 03450 pratyakṣās tad-viviktaṃ ca na anyat kiṃcid vibhāvyate
T11dhkprvku:1549: 03450 yat taj-jñānam paro apy enāṃ bhuñjīta anyena vid yadi
T11dhkprvku:1550: 03451 tajjā tat pratibhāsā vā yadi dhīr vetti na aparā
T11dhkprvku:1551: 03451 ālambamānasya anyasya apy asty avaśyam idaṃ dvayam
T11dhkprvku:1552: 03452 atha na utpadyate tasmān na ca tat pratibhāsinī
T11dhkprvku:1553: 03452 sā dhīrn nirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyaṃ ca tad-agrahe
T11dhkprvku:1554: 03453 na gṛhyata iti proktaṃ na ca tad-vastu kiṃcana
T11dhkprvku:1555: 03453 tasmād artha-avabhāso asau na anyas tasyā dhiyas tataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1557: 03454 na adhyakṣam iti ced eṣa kuto bhedaḥ samarthayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:1559: 03455 sarvathā anyo na gṛhṇīyāt saṃvid bhedo apy apoditaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1560: 03456 yeṣāṃ ca yogino anyasya pratyakṣeṇa sukha-ādikam
T11dhkprvku:1561: 03456 vidanti tulya-anubhavās tadvat te api syur āturāḥ
T11dhkprvku:1563: 03457 na udeti duḥkham iti cet na vai duḥkha-samudbhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1566: 03459 bhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ yadā
T11dhkprvku:1567: 03459 na tad-ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na tadā evaṃ prayujyate
T11dhkprvku:1569: 03460 artha-sārūpyam ālamba ātmā vittiḥ svayaṃ sphuṭaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1570: 03461 api ca adhyakṣatā abhāve dhiyaḥ syāl liṅgato gatiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1571: 03461 tac ca akṣam artho dhīḥ pūrvo manaskāro api vā bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1574: 03463 tathā artho dhī-manaskārau jñānaṃ tau ca na sidhyataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1575: 03463 na aprasiddhasya liṅgatvaṃ vyaktir arthasya cen matā
T11dhkprvku:1576: 03464 liṅgaṃ sā eva nanu jñānaṃ vyakto artho anena varṇitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1578: 03465 atha arthasya eva kaścit sa viśeṣo vyaktir iṣyate
T11dhkprvku:1580: 03466 tad iṣṭau vā pratijñānaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ prasajyate
T11dhkprvku:1581: 03466 sa ca jñāto athavā ajñāto bhavej jñātasya liṅgatā
T11dhkprvku:1582: 03467 yadi jñāte aparicchinne jñāto asāv iti tat kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1583: 03467 jñātatvena aparicchinnam api tad gamakaṃ katham
T11dhkprvku:1584: 03468 adṛṣṭa-dṛṣṭayo anyena draṣṭā dṛṣṭā na hi kvacit
T11dhkprvku:1585: 03468 viśeṣaḥ so anya-dṛṣṭāv apy asti iti syāt sva-dhī-gatiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1587: 03469 kevalān na artha-dharmāt kaḥ sva-dharmaḥ sva-dhiyo paraḥ
T11dhkprvku:1589: 03470 tasya bhedaḥ kuto buddher vyabhicāry-anyajaś ca saḥ
T11dhkprvku:1591: 03471 muktvā na kāryam aparaṃ tasyāḥ samupalabhyate
T11dhkprvku:1592: 03472 tatra atyakṣaṃ dvayaṃ pañcasv artheṣv eko api na īkṣyate
T11dhkprvku:1594: 03473 yad evam apratītaṃ tal liṅgam ity apy alaukikam
T11dhkprvku:1595: 03473 vidyamāne api liṅge tāṃ tena sārdham apaśyataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1596: 03474 kathaṃ pratīti-liṅgaṃ hi na adṛṣṭasya prakāśakam
T11dhkprvku:1597: 03474 tata eva asya liṅgāt prāk prasiddher upavarṇane
T11dhkprvku:1599: 03475 ity arthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ na arthāt tasyāḥ kathaṃcana
T11dhkprvku:1601: 03476 pratyakṣāṃ ca dhiyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāś ca iṣṭa-abhidhā-ādikam
T11dhkprvku:1602: 03477 para-citta-anumānaṃ ca na syād ātmany adarśanāt
T11dhkprvku:1604: 03478 prakāśitā kathaṃ vā syāt buddhir buddhy-antareṇa vaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1607: 03479 sa ca prakāśas tad-rūpaḥ svayam eva prakāśate
T11dhkprvku:1608: 03480 tathā abhyupagame buddheḥ buddhau buddhiḥ svavedikā
T11dhkprvku:1609: 03480 siddhā anyathā tulya-dharmā viṣayo api dhiyā saha
T11dhkprvku:1610: 03481 iti prakāśa-rūpā naḥ svayaṃ dhīḥ samprakāśate
T11dhkprvku:1612: 03482 sādṛśye api hi dhīr anyā prakāśyā na tayā matā
T11dhkprvku:1617: 03484 tasmād yato ayaṃ tasya api vācyam anyasya darśanam
T11dhkprvku:1618: 03485 smṛter apy ātmavit siddhā jñānasya anyena vedane
T11dhkprvku:1621: 03486 varṇaḥ syād akramo dīrghaḥ kramavān akramāṃ katham
T11dhkprvku:1623: 03487 akrameṇa grahād anta-krama-vad dhīś ca no bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1624: 03488 āntyaṃ pūrva-sthitād ūrdhvaṃ vardhamāno dhvanir bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1625: 03489 sthāne svayaṃ na naśyet sā paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1627: 03490 sakṛd yatna-udbhavād vyarthaḥ syād yatnaś ca uttarottaraḥ
T11dhkprvku:1628: 03490 vyaktāv apy eṣa varṇānāṃ doṣaḥ samanuṣajyate
T11dhkprvku:1629: 03491 anekayā tad-grahaṇe yā antyā dhīḥ sā anubhūyate
T11dhkprvku:1630: 03491 na dīrgha-grāhikā sā ca tan na syād dīrgha-dhī-smṛtiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1631: 03492 pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnāṃ saṃvittau tad-dhvaniḥ śruteḥ
T11dhkprvku:1632: 03492 avicchinna-ābhatā na syād ghaṭanaṃ ca nirākṛtam
T11dhkprvku:1633: 03493 vicchinnaṃ śṛṇvato apy asya yady avicchinna-vibhramaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1639: 03496 eka-aṇv-atyaya-kālaś ca kālo alpīyān kṣaṇo mataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1640: 03496 buddhiś ca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramād varṇān prapadyate
T11dhkprvku:1642: 03497 vicchinnā apy anyayā buddhiḥ sarvā syād vitatha-arthikā
T11dhkprvku:1643: 03498 ghaṭanaṃ yac ca bhāvānām anyatra indriya-vibhramāt
T11dhkprvku:1646: 03499 na akṣa-grāhye asti śabdānāṃ yojanā iti vivecitam
T11dhkprvku:1647: 03500 vicchinnaṃ paśyato apy akṣair ghaṭayed yadi kalpanā
T11dhkprvku:1648: 03500 arthasya tat saṃvitteś ca satataṃ bhāsamānayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:1649: 03501 bādhake asati san nyāye vicchinna iti tat kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1650: 03501 buddhīnāṃ śakti-niyamād iti cet sa kuto mataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1651: 03502 yugapad buddhy-adṛṣṭeś cet tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
T11dhkprvku:1653: 03503 tathā hi samyak lakṣyante vikalpāḥ krama-bhāvinaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1655: 03504 spaṣṭa-avabhāsāaṃ pratyakṣāṃ kalpayet so api vāritaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1657: 03505 pratīta-bhede apy adhyakṣā dhīḥ kathaṃ tādṛśī bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1660: 03506 sa eva ayam iti jñānaṃ na asti tac ca akṣaje kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1661: 03507 na ca artha-jñāna-saṃvittyor yugapat sambhavo yataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1662: 03507 lakṣyate pratibhāsau dvau na artha-artha-jñānayoḥ pṛthak
T11dhkprvku:1663: 03508 na hy artha-ābhāsi ca jñānam artho bāhyaś ca kevalaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1665: 03509 sūpalakṣyeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau
T11dhkprvku:1666: 03509 artha-artha-pratyayau paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham
T11dhkprvku:1670: 03511 na hi saṃvedanaṃ śuddhaṃ bhaved arthasya vedanam
T11dhkprvku:1671: 03512 tathā hi nīla-ādy-ākāra eka ekaṃ ca vedanam
T11dhkprvku:1672: 03512 lakṣyate na tu nīla-ābhe vedane vedanaṃ param
T11dhkprvku:1673: 03513 jñāna-antareṇa anubhavo bhavet tatra api ca smṛtiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1674: 03513 dṛṣṭā tad-vedanaṃ kena tasya apy anyena ced imām
T11dhkprvku:1675: 03514 mālāṃ jñāna-vidāṃ ko ayaṃ janayaty anubandhinīm
T11dhkprvku:1676: 03514 pūrvā dhīḥ sā eva cen na syāt saṃcāro viṣaya-antare
T11dhkprvku:1678: 03515 agṛhītvā uttaraṃ jñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād aparaṃ katham
T11dhkprvku:1679: 03516 ātmani jñāna-janane svabhāve niyatāṃ ca tām
T11dhkprvku:1680: 03516 ko nāma anyo vibadhnīyād bahir-aṅge antaraṅgikām
T11dhkprvku:1681: 03517 bāhyaḥ saṃnihito apy arthaḥ tāṃ vibandhuṃ hi na prabhuḥ
T11dhkprvku:1682: 03517 dhiyaṃ na anubhavet kaścid anyathā arthasya saṃnidhau
T11dhkprvku:1683: 03518 na ca saṃnihita-arthā asti daśā kācid ato dhiyaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1684: 03518 utsanna-mūlā smṛtir apy utsannā ity ujjvalaṃ matam
T11dhkprvku:1688: 03520 viṣaya-antara-saṃcāro yadi sā eva artha-dhīḥ kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1689: 03521 śakti-kṣaye pūrva-dhiyaḥ na hi dhīḥ prāg dhiyā vinā
T11dhkprvku:1693: 03523 na apekṣeta anyathā sāmyaṃ mano-vṛtter mano antaram
T11dhkprvku:1695: 03524 ekatvān manaso anyasmin saktasya anya-agater yadi
T11dhkprvku:1697: 03525 samavṛttau ca tulyatvāt sarvadā anya-agatir bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1698: 03525 janma ca ātma-mano yoga-mātrajānāṃ sakṛd bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1699: 03526 ekā eva cet kriyā ekaḥ syāt kiṃ dīpo aneka-darśanaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1700: 03526 krameṇa api na śaktaṃ syāt paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1701: 03527 anena deha puruṣāv uktau saṃskārato yadi
T11dhkprvku:1702: 03527 niyamaḥ sa kutaḥ paścād buddheś ced astu sammatam
T11dhkprvku:1703: 03528 na grāhyatā anyā jananāj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇam
T11dhkprvku:1704: 03528 agrāhyaṃ na hi tejo asti na ca saukṣmya-ādy-anaṃśake
T11dhkprvku:1706: 03529 grāhyatāyā na khalv anyaj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇe
T11dhkprvku:1707: 03530 sākṣān na hy anyathā buddhe rūpa-ādir upakārakaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1709: 03531 buddher api tad asti iti sā api tattve vyavasthitā
T11dhkprvku:1711: 03532 rūpa-ādeś cetasaś ca evam aviśuddha-dhiyaṃ prati
T11dhkprvku:1714: 03533 rūpa-ādi-buddheḥ kiṃ jātaṃ paścād yat prāṅ na vidyate
T11dhkprvku:1715: 03534 sati sva-dhī-grahe tasmāt sā eva anantara-hetutā
T11dhkprvku:1716: 03534 cetaso grāhyatā sā eva tato na artha-antarā gatiḥ
T11dhkprvku:1718: 03535 prakṛtyā eva iti gaditaṃ nānā-ekasmān na ced bhavet
T11dhkprvku:1719: 03536 na kiṃcid ekam ekasmāt sāmagryāḥ sarva-sambhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:1720: 03536 ekaṃ syād api sāmagrayor ity uktaṃ tad anekakṛt
T11dhkprvku:1721: 03537 arthaṃ pūrvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād yadi dhīḥ parā
T11dhkprvku:1724: 03538 dvir dvir ekaṃ ca bhāseta bhāsanād ātma-tad-vidoḥ
T11dhkprvku:1727: 03540 ātma-anubhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na anubhūtaṃ parair yadi
T11dhkprvku:1728: 03540 ātma-anubhūtiḥ sā siddhā kṛto yena evam ucyate
T11dhkprvku:1729: 03541 vyakti-hetv-aprasiddhiḥ syān na vyakter vyaktam icchataḥ
T11dhkprvku:1730: 03541 vyakty-asiddhāv api vyaktaṃ yadi vyaktam idaṃ jagat

T11dhkprvku:2048: 04159 gurutvaṃ kāryam ālāya yadi na eva upalakṣyate
T11dhkprvku:2049: 04160 ā sarṣapād gurutvaṃ tad durlakṣitam analpakam
T11dhkprvku:2051: 04161 nanv adṛṣṭo aṃśu-vat so artho na ca tat-kāryam īkṣyate
T11dhkprvku:2056: 04163 udāharaṇam apy anyad diśā gamyam yathoktayā
T11dhkprvku:2058: 04164 tathā param pratinyastam sādhyaṃ na iṣṭaṃ tadā api tat
T11dhkprvku:2060: 04165 tasmāt sādhya-śrutirn na iṣṭaṃ viśeṣam avalambate
T11dhkprvku:2063: 04167 sarvasya ca aprasiddhatvāt kathaṃcit tena na kṣamaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2070: 04170 śāstreṇa alaṃ yathāyogaṃ loka eva pravartatām
T11dhkprvku:2074: 04172 vyarthā vyāpti-phalā sā uktiḥ sāmarthyād gamyate tataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2077: 04174 pakṣa-doṣaḥ para-apekṣo na iti ca pratipāditam
T11dhkprvku:2078: 04174 iṣṭa-asambhavy-asiddhaś ca sa eva syāt nirākṛtaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2080: 04175 dṛṣṭānta-ākhyān ato anyat kim asty atra artha-anudarśanam
T11dhkprvku:2082: 04176 na tad-vyāpteḥ phalaṃ vā kiṃ sāmānyena anuvartane
T11dhkprvku:2083: 04177 syān nirākaraṇaṃ śabde sthitena eva ity ato abravīt
T11dhkprvku:2084: 04177 viruddha-viṣaye anyasmin vadann āha anyatāṃ śruteḥ
T11dhkprvku:2085: 04178 sā ca bheda-apratikṣepāt sāmānyānāṃ na vidyate
T11dhkprvku:2086: 04178 vṛkṣo na śiṃśapā eva iti yathā prakaraṇe kvacit
T11dhkprvku:2087: 04179 sarva-śruter eka-vṛttirn niṣedhaḥ syān na tāvatā
T11dhkprvku:2091: 04181 sarvatra doṣas tulyaś cen na saṃvṛtyā viśeṣataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2097: 04184 dharmī dharmāś ca bhāsante vyavahāras tad-āśrayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2099: 04185 sādhyaḥ sādhanatāṃ nītas tena asiddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2102: 04187 pakṣa-aṅgatve apy abādhatvān na asiddhir bhinna-dharmiṇi
T11dhkprvku:2103: 04187 yathā aśvo na viṣāṇitvād eṣa piṇḍo viṣāṇavān
T11dhkprvku:2104: 04188 sādhya-kāla-aṅgatā vā na nivṛtter upalakṣya tat
T11dhkprvku:2105: 04188 viśeṣo api pratijñā-artho dharma-bhedān na yujyate
T11dhkprvku:2108: 04190 ayogaṃ yogam aparair atyantāyogam eva ca
T11dhkprvku:2111: 04191 vivakṣāto prayoge api tasya artho ayaṃ pratīyate
T11dhkprvku:2113: 04192 pārtho dhanurdharo nīlaṃ sarojam iti vā yathā
T11dhkprvku:2120: 04196 na hi svabhāvād anyena vyāptir gamyasya kāraṇe
T11dhkprvku:2122: 04197 prayatnānantaraṃ jñānaṃ prāk sato niyamena na
T11dhkprvku:2126: 04199 etena eva prasiddho api svabhāvasya pṛthak kṛtiḥ
T11dhkprvku:2127: 04199 kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvam īdṛśam
T11dhkprvku:2129: 04200 prabheda-mātram ākhyātaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tu na bhidyate
T11dhkprvku:2130: 04201 tena atra kārya-liṅgena svabhāvo apy ekadeśa-bhāk
T11dhkprvku:2132: 04202 yan nāntarīyakā sattā yo vā ātmā svo avibhāgavān
T11dhkprvku:2133: 04202 sa tena avyabhicārī syād ity arthaṃ tat prabhedanam
T11dhkprvku:2134: 04203 saṃyogy-ādiṣu yeṣv asti pratibandho na tādṛśam
T11dhkprvku:2135: 04203 na te hetava ity uktaṃ vyabhicārasya sambhavāt
T11dhkprvku:2136: 04204 sati vā pratibandhes tu sa eva gati-sādhanaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2137: 04204 niyamo hy avinābhāvo anityaś ca na sādhanam
T11dhkprvku:2139: 04205 tac ca na apratibaddheṣu tata eva anvaya-sthitiḥ
T11dhkprvku:2140: 04206 svātmatve hetu-bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā
T11dhkprvku:2141: 04206 sidhyaty ato viśeṣe na vyatireko na ca anvayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2143: 04207 uktā anaikāntikas tasmād anyathā gamako bhavet
T11dhkprvku:2145: 04208 ātmano vinivarteta prāṇa-ādir yadi tac ca na
T11dhkprvku:2147: 04209 tadātmā tat-prasūtaś cen na etad ātma-upalambhane
T11dhkprvku:2148: 04210 tasya upalabdhāv agatāv agatau ca prasidhyati
T11dhkprvku:2149: 04210 te ca atyantaparokṣasya dṛṣṭy-adṛṣṭī na sidhyataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2150: 04211 anyatra adṛṣṭa-rūpasya ghaṭa-ādau na iti vā kutaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2152: 04212 prāṇa-ādeś ca kvacid dṛṣṭyā sattva-asattvaṃ pratīyate
T11dhkprvku:2153: 04212 tathā ātmā yadi dṛśyeta sattva-asattvaṃ pratīyate
T11dhkprvku:2154: 04213 yasya hetor abhāvena ghaṭe prāṇo na dṛśyate
T11dhkprvku:2155: 04213 dehe api yady asau na syād yukto dehena sambhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2156: 04214 bhinne api kiṃcit sādharmyād yadi tattvaṃ pratīyate
T11dhkprvku:2157: 04214 prameyatvād ghaṭa-ādīnāṃ sātmatvaṃ kiṃ na mīyate
T11dhkprvku:2158: 04215 aniṣṭaṃ cet pramāṇaṃ hi sarva-iṣṭīnāṃ nibandhanam
T11dhkprvku:2159: 04215 bhāva-abhāva-vyavasthāṃ kaḥ kartuṃ tena vinā prabhuḥ
T11dhkprvku:2165: 04218 na tasya vyabhicāritvād vyatireke api cet katham
T11dhkprvku:2166: 04219 na asādhyād eva viśleṣas tasya nanv evam ucyate
T11dhkprvku:2167: 04219 sādhye anuvṛtty-abhāvo arthāt tasya anyatra apy asau samaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2168: 04220 asādhyād eva viccheda iti sādhye astitā ucyate
T11dhkprvku:2169: 04220 arthāpattyā ata eva uktam ekena dvaya-darśanam
T11dhkprvku:2172: 04222 nivṛttirn na asataḥ sādhyād asādhyeṣv eva no tataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2173: 04222 na iti sā eva nivṛttiḥ kiṃ nivṛtter asato matā
T11dhkprvku:2174: 04223 nivṛtty-abhāvas tu vidhir vastu-bhāvo asato api san
T11dhkprvku:2175: 04223 vastv-abhāvas tu na asti iti paśya bāndhya-vijṛmbhitam
T11dhkprvku:2176: 04224 nivṛttir yadi tasmin na hetor vṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
T11dhkprvku:2177: 04224 sā api na pratiṣedho ayaṃ nivṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
T11dhkprvku:2178: 04225 vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ ca muktvā śābdo asti na aparaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2179: 04225 vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu na iti prāptā atra mūkatā
T11dhkprvku:2180: 04226 satāṃ ca na niṣedho asti so asatsu ca na vidyate
T11dhkprvku:2181: 04226 jagaty anena nyāyena nañ-arthaḥ pralayaṃ gataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2182: 04227 deśa-kāla-niṣedhaś ced yathā asti sa niṣidhyate
T11dhkprvku:2183: 04227 na tathā na yathā so asti tathā api na niṣidhyate
T11dhkprvku:2186: 04229 tābhyāṃ sa dharmī sambaddhaḥ khyāty-abhāve api tādṛśaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2187: 04229 śabda-pravṛtter asti iti so api iṣṭo vyavahāra-bhāk
T11dhkprvku:2193: 04232 vidhāv ekasya tad-bhājām iva anyeṣām upekṣakam
T11dhkprvku:2194: 04233 niṣedhe tad-viviktaṃ ca tad anyeṣām apekṣakam
T11dhkprvku:2198: 04235 tat-phalo atat-phalaś ca artho bhinna ekas tatas tataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2201: 04236 dṛṣṭiṃ bheda-āśrayais te api tasmād ajñāta-viplavāḥ
T11dhkprvku:2202: 04237 sattā-sādhana-vṛtteś ca sandigdhaḥ syād asan na saḥ
T11dhkprvku:2203: 04237 asattvaṃ ca abhyupagamād apramāṇān na yujyate
T11dhkprvku:2207: 04239 dvairāśye saty adṛṣṭe api syād adṛṣṭeṣu saṃśayaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2210: 04241 bhāve virodhasya adṛṣṭau kaḥ sandehaṃ nivartayet
T11dhkprvku:2211: 04241 kvacid viniyamāt ko anyas tat-kārya-ātmatayā sa ca
T11dhkprvku:2212: 04242 nairātmyād api tena asya sandigdhaṃ vinivartanam
T11dhkprvku:2213: 04242 astu nāma tathā apy ātmā na anairātmyāt prasidhyati
T11dhkprvku:2214: 04243 yena asau vyatirekasya na abhāvaṃ bhāvam icchati
T11dhkprvku:2215: 04243 yathā na avyatireke api prāṇa-ādirn na sapakṣataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2216: 04244 sapakṣa-avyatirekī ced hetur hetur ato anvayī
T11dhkprvku:2217: 04244 na anvayy avyatirekī ced anairātmyaṃ na sātmakam
T11dhkprvku:2218: 04245 yan nāntarīyakaḥ svātmā yasya siddhaḥ pravṛttiṣu
T11dhkprvku:2219: 04245 nivartakaḥ sa eva ataḥ pravṛttau ca pravartakaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2221: 04246 kārye dṛṣṭir adṛṣṭiś ca kāryakāraṇatā hi te
T11dhkprvku:2225: 04248 tair vinā bhavato anyasmāt tajjaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
T11dhkprvku:2227: 04249 sā cen na bhedikā prāptam eka-rūpam idaṃ jagat
T11dhkprvku:2230: 04251 tat tasya ajananaṃ rūpam anyasya yadi sā eva sā
T11dhkprvku:2231: 04251 na tasya ajananaṃ rūpaṃ tat tasyāḥ sambhavet katham
T11dhkprvku:2233: 04252 tasmāt sva-dṛṣṭāv iva tad dṛṣṭe kārye api gamyate
T11dhkprvku:2235: 04253 drava-śakter yataḥ kledaḥ sā tv ekā eva dvayor api
T11dhkprvku:2236: 04254 bhinna-abhinnaḥ kim asya ātmā bhinno atha dravatā katham
T11dhkprvku:2237: 04254 abhinnā ity ucyate buddhes tad-rūpāyā abhedataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2239: 04255 yena aṃśena adadhad dhūmaṃ tena aṃśena tathā gatiḥ
T11dhkprvku:2241: 04256 dhūmo atad-vyabhicāri iti siddhaṃ kāryaṃ tathā param
T11dhkprvku:2243: 04257 anagniś ced adhūmo asau sadhūmaś cet sapāvakaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2249: 04260 siddha-udāharaṇā ity ukta-anupalabdhiḥ pṛthag na tu
T11dhkprvku:2250: 04261 tatra apy adṛśyāt puruṣāt prāṇa-āder anivartanāt
T11dhkprvku:2253: 04262 vastuny api tu pūrvābhyāṃ paryudāso vidhānataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2254: 04263 tatra upalabhyeṣv astitvam upalabdher na ca aparam
T11dhkprvku:2258: 04265 tathā anyā na upalabhyeṣu na astitā anupalambhanāt
T11dhkprvku:2260: 04266 siddho hi vyavahāro ayaṃ dṛśya-adṛṣṭāv asann iti
T11dhkprvku:2261: 04266 tasyāḥ siddhāv asandigdhau tat-kāryatve api dhī-dhvanī
T11dhkprvku:2262: 04267 vidyamāne hi viṣaye mohād atra ananubruvan
T11dhkprvku:2269: 04270 buddher upalabhe vā iti kalpikāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2270: 04271 viśeṣo gamyate arthānāṃ viśiṣṭād eva vedanāt
T11dhkprvku:2272: 04272 tasmāt svato dhiyor bheda-siddhis tābhyāṃ tad-arthayoḥ
T11dhkprvku:2273: 04272 anyathā hy anavasthānād bhedaḥ sidhyen na kasyacit
T11dhkprvku:2276: 04274 tasmād anupalambho ayaṃ svayaṃ pratyakṣato gataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2281: 04276 yathā aliṅgo anya-sattveṣu vikalpa-ādir na sidhyati
T11dhkprvku:2282: 04277 aniścaya-phalā hy eṣā na alaṃ vyāvṛtti-sādhane
T11dhkprvku:2283: 04277 ādyā adhikriyate hetor niścayena eva sādhane
T11dhkprvku:2284: 04278 tasyāḥ svayaṃ prayogeṣu svarūpaṃ vā prayujyate
T11dhkprvku:2290: 04281 nāśanaṃ janayitvā anyaṃ sa hetus tasya nāśanaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2291: 04281 tam eva naśvaraṃ bhāvaṃ janayed yadi kiṃ bhavet
T11dhkprvku:2292: 04282 ātma-upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddha-ātmanaḥ sataḥ
T11dhkprvku:2293: 04282 na ātma-upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate
T11dhkprvku:2294: 04283 anapekṣaś ca kiṃ bhāvo atathābhūtaḥ kadācana
T11dhkprvku:2295: 04283 yathā na kṣepa-bhāg iṣṭaḥ sa eva udbhūta-nāśakaḥ
T11dhkprvku:2296: 04284 kṣaṇam apy anapekṣatve bhāvo bhāvasya na iti cet
T11dhkprvku:2297: 04284 bhāvo hi sa tathābhūto abhāve bhāvas tathā katham
T11dhkprvku:2303: 04286 prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva sva-dehe jarām
